mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.smtp AS "smtp", a.port AS "port", a.mailname AS "mailName", a.mailpassword AS "mailPassword", a.smsname AS "smsName", a.smspassword AS "smsPassword"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO systemconfig( id, smtp, port, mailname, mailpassword, smsname, smspassword ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{smtp}, #{port}, #{mailName}, #{mailPassword}, #{smsName}, #{smsPassword} )
mapper.update: UPDATE systemconfig SET smtp = #{smtp}, port = #{port}, mailname = #{mailName}, mailpassword = #{mailPassword}, smsname = #{smsName}, smspassword = #{smsPassword} WHERE id = #{id}
